Adventurer Helper:
Tell You again.
You have to kill the Baby Drakelow Hot Springs, Buffalo Hot Springs, Flower Hot Springs, Awful Brat Hot Springs, Antelope Hot Springs, Nepenthes Hot Springs, Hot Springs Yeti Brat Hot Springs, Drakelow Hot Springs and Hot Springs Grendel, as well as to gain 40 vessels of Water from a Hot spring and take them in Aden Warehouse Worker Valderama. I think You should be going to the Hot Springs. You all understand? Hooray for the lot!
